product_name: The North Face Talimena Cami Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The long length and a touch of stretch make The North Face women's Talimena Cami scoop-neck tank top a warm weather essential. A shelf bra offers streamlined support for low-impact activity. Slim-fit of The North Face Talimena Cami top is easy to layer under your favorite hoodies and sweaters. Closeout.
